text: HI GOOD MORNING
Hello and good morning to you too
SO MANY CHILDREN ARE DYING.
Yes, I agree. I honestly think we should donate to the children's charity. Even if it's a slim chance it's important to help them.
YES, I DONATE 20 DOLLAR TO THE CHILDREN ITS VERY HELP TO THEM.
That's very kind of you and think that is a very fail amount
WHY, HOW MUCH DID YOU DONATE TO THEM.
I donated half of what you did. Sadly I can't donate to much but I try to donate when I can.
SO , THAT NOT A PROBLEM YOU GIVE A 1 CENT ALSO ITS VERY USEFUL TO THEM.
That's kind of you to say. I'm glad you're so optimistic ;)
YOU KNOW THE CHARITY NAME?
I only know it's a children's charity. Though I donate a it to make a wish.
OK ANT CHARITY, OUR HELP GO TO THE CHILD, ITS VERY HAPPY TO THAT.
Yes, I'm happy to know that I can help them and hope others will as well in the future.
YES, BUT  SAVE THE CHILDREN CHARITY IS VERY GOOD CHARITY TO , COMPARE TO THE CHARITY
Yes that is a good charity. I wouldn't mind donating to save the children :)
OH, OKAY KEEP DONATING TO THE CHILDREN.
I will, I hope you will as well :)
YES, WE SAVE THE LITTLE CHILDREN. I PROUD OF YOU.
And I of you know that what you re doing is very commendable. The children are our future we must do what we can to protect them
